column2: o  HMC  Taxila  Visit  On  November  27,  2023,  FSM  students  visited  Heavy
Mechanical Complex (HMC) in Taxila. The visit offered students a firsthand
look at the industrial manufacturing processes and operations, enriching their
understanding of engineering applications in a large-scale industrial setting.
o  Attock  Refinery  Morgah  Visit  An  industrial  visit  to  Attock  Refinery  in
Morgah was arranged for FSM students. This opportunity allowed students
to observe the refineryâ€™s operations, gaining practical insights into petroleum
processing and the engineering techniques involved.
